subject: National Invitation Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Alabama edged Colorado in matchup of coaches whose former teams made the N.C.A.A. tournament. The Crimson Tide will face Wichita State in the N.I.T. title game.
snippet: Alabama edged Colorado in matchup of coaches whose former teams made the N.C.A.A. tournament. The Crimson Tide will face Wichita State in the N.I.T. title game.
